statements: DELETE FROM operational_metrics WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM table1 WHERE column1 = value1;
DELETE FROM table2 WHERE column4 = value4 AND column5 = value5;
DELETE FROM table1 WHERE column1 = 'value1' AND column2 = 'value2';
DELETE FROM table2 WHERE column5 = 'value5' AND column4 = 'value4';
DELETE FROM OperationsData WHERE operation_id = 15 AND operation_type = 'IN_PROGRESS';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM operations_metrics WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND user_id = 456;
